Text:
Dear Sasha, I believe that disc number 4 is missing.

Caro Sasha, creio que o disco número 4 está em falta.

isn't disc 4 missing?

não falta o disco 4?

oh you nasty person. we honest folk trying to see one of the best cartoon series ever nd you denying us the pleasure of seing it on a row...

Now seriously. If you have it post it as a sparate torrent and add a comment here with the link

many thanks

Sasha, could you at least restart seeding? We're all stuck @ 84,8%, with only the the small VOB, BUP and IFO files missing from DVD 5, and the whole DVD 6 not downloaded at all...

Thanks man!
